articles.title: Riz Ahmed Launches New Muslim Media Representation Initiative - NPR
articles.description: The Oscar-nominated actor is launching an initiative on Muslim representation in movies, after a new study showed less than 10% of the top films between 2017 and 2019 depicted Muslims on screen.
articles.content:
Riz Ahmed at the 2021 Academy Awards.
